c74object.name: fl.tag~
c74object.digest: Tags vectors with names ready to send to the parameter input of an object, or for routing purposes.
c74object.description: A variable number of inputs is available, each of which deal will a specific tag. The number of inputs is specified either explicitly with a parameter or implicitly by which arguments or tag parameters are present.The final input takes tagged input which is concatanated with other inputs after tagging. All inputs trigger output.

entry.name: 0. /num_ins [instantiation int]
entry.description: Sets the number of inputs (and hence the number of tags).

entry.name: 1. /empty_mode [instantiation enum]
entry.description:
Sets the behaviour when received empty frames: ignore - empty frames are ignored / reset - empty frames create empty tags to reset parameters.
[0] - ignore [1] - reset
